name: TubeTastic Fringed Scarf - Mesa
description:
Handmade – Crochet – Free Shipping

Really Chic and Very Soft Tubular Fringed Scarf

Subtle gradations in color change from Burnt orange, gold, brown, red, and violet makes this scarf very unique.

 You can wrap the crocheted scarf several times for a warm, snuggly cowl effect, or leave it long and loose for an artsy look. It was crocheted in a tubular design, so it is very warm and not stiff at all. Keep up with the fashion trends and make them work for you! You will always look chic and elegant wearing my carefully designed feminine pieces.I handmade this beautiful scarf with great love and care.

Please see photos to see how meticulously it has been crocheted. You will get many compliments wearing this luxurious scarf which you can use any time of the day.

I always choose the yarns and colors that will keep you and your soul warm. You will not want to take it off!"Approximate Measurements Length :90 inches ( 7.5 Feet )Width : 3 inches

You may be wondering where I get my pricing from. Well, this yarn is not cheap and I did put a lot of time and love into making it.

Not to mention this is my own pattern that I designed while making this scarf. I hope that satisfies your curiosity. If not, please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have. The item should hand washed, lay and dry. In my humble opinion. But manufacturer’s recommendations are listed below.Thank you :)

Aran Yarn - 53% Wool & 47% Acrylic

Product Care Instructions: Machine wash. Initial water temperature should not exceed 30C or 65 to 85F. Any dry cleaning solvent other than trichloroethylene may be safely used. No bleach product may be used. Lay out horizontally for drying. Item may not be smoothed or finished with an iron.

name: Baby Multi Colored Elf Hat - Unisex
description:
*** Free Shipping***

These little hats are unique and FUN! The soft little beanie is adorned with a long tail.
I hand-crochet these hats using fluffy acrylic yarn. It is extremely soft & comfortable.

Cabled edging to add a little more stretch to it.

Soft, silky and beautiful! A uniquely textured yarn that is not only beautiful to look at but very soft to the touch. Super soft; never itchy. Will not shrink with your laundry. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me..

Size: Newborn to 3 to 6 Months
Hat Circumference 14 " 
Hat height = 5" 

These hats are NOT for unattended use use b/c the long tail. 
I have lots of other cute hats available for everyday use in my shop.

Perfect for a Photo Prop or Babies First Photo's.

Machine Wash and Machine Dry on cold and low settings.

Made in the USA ... Yarn comes from a hydro-generated New Hampshire mill. 

I Love custom orders, so please do not hesitate in contacting me for yours. 

Email me @ foreverentwined@live.comThank You !!!

name: Beeautiful Bumble Bee Elfin Crocheted Cap
description:
*FREE SHIPPING*
This is a darling "Elfin" style hat perfect for photographing that adorable baby. Crocheted from soft acrylic yarns (not the scratchy stuff you typically find at craft stores) in stripes of golden yellow & black.

Cabled edging to add a little more stretch to it.

Fits a little lower on the ears than most of my hats, so it frames the face beautifully. Certainly not just a prop, it's also perfect for keeping that precious head fashionably warm in cooler weather as well!

This is a 3 to 6 months. May be more or less depending on your baby.

It fits a 12" to 17" head

Soft, silky and beautiful! A uniquely textured yarn that is not only beautiful to look at but very soft to the touch. Super soft; never itchy. Will not shrink with your laundry. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me..

Machine Wash and Machine Dry
Made in the USA ... Yarn comes from a hydro-generated New Hampshire mill. 
I Love custom orders, so please do not hesitate in contacting me for yours. 
Email me @ foreverentwined@live.comThank You !!!

name: Midnight Majik Cotton Coasters
description:
*FREE SHIPPING*

Midnight Magic Coasters are the Perfect Gift for Everyone!

Set of 6 Coasters

My coasters work better than any coaster you have used before because they soak up water/moisture the best! 

They are made from 100% cotton and cotton yarn is perfect for absorbing liquid. 

Beautiful colors and totally useful anywhere indoors, outdoors, camping etc..., so place a set of these on top of any surface to prevent water marks or just plain old wet rings.

These coasters are machine washable and dryable which makes it very easy to care for. 
Machine wash gentle or handwash in warm water. 
Machine dry, low heat. Remove while still damp. 
Reshape and lay flat to dry..

Appox Size is 4 1/4"

It is a great gift for yourself or for your friends, family members, teachers, and every one who loves beautiful handmade home decor items.

All of my items are made with love.

In need of a different color or do you want mix it up alittle? 

That is NO problem at all. 

I Love custom orders, so please don't be shy. Just drop me a line. 
It's as easy as clicking on the "Contact" link on the right. 
Thank You !!!


Thanks again for visiting my shop!

Sincerely, 
Forever Entwined !
